item.title: Asmodeus's Dread Authority
item.fluff: Asmodeus invests you with the authority he uses to rule the Nine Hells

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); The boon's level +5 vs. Will
Hit The target is subject to your dread authority (save ends).
While subject to your authority, you can slide the target 1 square at the start of each of its turns.
Level 13Slide 2 squares.
Level 23Slide 3 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature subject to your dread authority, or one devil); The target chooses to either fall prone or take 5 fire damage. A devil does not benefit from resists against this damage.
Level 1310 fire damage.
Level 23Ongoing 15 fire damage (save ends).

item.title: Avandra's Blessing of Confidence
item.fluff: Individuals blessed by Avandra gain an indomitable confidence in their own capabilities, allowing them to call upon teir inner stregnth to augment themselves

block.name: Properties
block.line: You gain resist 5 all against reactive strikes.
Level 13Resist 10 all.
Level 23Resist 15 all.
You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that render you dazed, dominated, immobilized, restrained, slowed, or stunned.

item.title: Avandra's Boon of Escape
item.fluff: Gambits that rely on luck draw boons from Avandra, and individuals blessed by her are impossible to corner

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou started your turn adjacent to two or more enemies
EffectYou shift 2 squares.
Level 13Shift 3 squares.
Level 23Shift 4 squares.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou teleport up to 2 squares.
Level 13Up to 4 squares.
Level 23Up to 6 squares.

item.title: Avandra's Boon of Storms
item.fluff: Like an ocean storm, change is both inevitable and rarely controllable, but to those who embrace change rather than fight it, Avandra occasionally grants the power to influence events

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks.
Level 11+3 item bonus.
Level 21+5 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a skill check and don't like the result
EffectYou reroll the skill check and use the second result, even if it's lower.
Level 11Use whichever result is higher.
Level 21If the triggering skill check still fails, you regain the use of this power when you take a short rest.

item.title: Bahamut's Protective Ward
item.fluff: Bahamut grants his boon to heroes who shield the weak from the strong, and individuals who fight in Bahamut's name are beacons of hope and protection

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with reactive strikes.
Level 13+2 item bonus.
Level 23+3 item bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your next turn, enemies provoke reactive strikes from you if they make an attack that does not include you as a target.
Level 13You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with these attacks.
Level 23You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with these attacks.

item.title: Bane's Battle Acument
item.fluff: The Iron General is the consummate warrior and those with his favor gain a measure of his tactical acumen

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you roll a natural 19 or 20 on a Weapon attack roll, one ally within 5 squares of you can shift 1 square as a free action.
Level 13The ally shifts up to 2 squares.
Level 23One ally within 5 squares of you can shift up to 2 quares as a free reaction, or two allies within 5 squares of you can each shift 1 square as a free reaction.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou roll initiative
EffectClose burst 5 (each ally in the burst); You slide each target 1 square.
Level 13Slide up to 2 squares.
Level 23Slide up to 3 squares.

item.title: Blessing of Blazing Fangs
item.fluff: Pain sears your neck, but you do not scream, for from this day, you can proudly display the burn scars left by the spirit's bite

block.name: Property
block.line: When you take fire damage, you deal +2 extra damage with all attacks until the end of your next turn. You can choose to make this extra damage fire damage. The damage is halved for multiattacks.
Level 14+4 extra damage.
Level 24+6 extra damage.

item.title: Corellon's Boon of Arcane Might
item.fluff: Corellon brought arcane magic to the world, and mortals who please him gain access to powers that otherwise take years of study to master

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain one 1st-level at-will attack power from an arcane class as an encounter power.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectChoose a 1st-level encounter power from the same arcane class this boon's property granted you a power. You can use the chosen power once before the end of the encounter.
Level 8A 3rd-level or lower encounter power.
Level 13A 7th-level or lower encounter power.
Level 18A 13th-level or lower encounter power.
Level 23A 17th-level or lower encounter power.
Level 28A 23rd-level or lower encounter power.

item.title: Erathis' Beacon
item.fluff: The first cities were carved from the wilderness in the name of Erathis and, with her boon, the same sense of teamwork allows you and your allies to overcome any obstacle

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use the aid another or aid defense action, you grant your ally a +4 bonus rather than +2.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 5 (one ally in the burst); The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value. The target also gains a +1 bonus to his or her next attack roll.
Level 13The target regains an additional 1d6 hit points, and gains a +2 bonus.
Level 23The target regains an additional 2d6 hit points, and gains a +3 bonus.

item.title: Flickers of Faith
item.fluff: A sense of benevolent guidance fills you, and occasionally sustains you

block.name: Property
block.line: Your number of healing surges increases by one.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, and aren't killed
EffectRoll a d6. On a result of 3 or higher, you regain hit points equal to your healing surge value, plus additional hit points equal to the result of the 1d6.
Level 14Roll 2d6. On a result of 5 or higher, and additional hit points equal to twice the result of the 2d6.
Level 24Roll 3d6. On a result of 7 or higher, and additional hit points equal to three times the result of the 3d6.

item.title: Gruumsh's Bloodthirsty Wrath
item.fluff: Destruction and carnage are the only things able to quell Gruumsh's appetite for chaos

block.name: Property
block.line: The first time in an encounter that you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain temporary hit points equal to this boon's level. These temporary hit points last until the end of the encounter.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: RequirementYou must be bloodied, or become bloodied by the triggering attack.
TriggerAn attack hits you.
EffectYou make a melee basic attack against a random creature within your reach. If this attack hits, you can also spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

item.title: Hamanu's Terrible Roar
item.fluff: When you speak with the voice of the King of the World, all creatures around you tremble

block.name: Properties
block.line: Hamanu's boon has the following properties:
When you hit a target with a power that pushes the target, you can increase that push by 1 square.
Whenever you hit a target with a Thunder power, the target is deafened (save ends). This is included in this boon's hit entry.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackClose blast 3 (each creature in the blast); Item's level +5 vs. Fortitude
Level 16Close blast 4
Level 26Close blast 5
Hit1d6 thunder damage and you push the target up to 1 square, and the target is deafened (save ends).
Level 162d6 thunder damage.
Level 263d6 thunder damage and push up to 2 squares.

item.title: Ioun's Revelation
item.fluff: Ioun rewards study and the relentless pursuit of knowledge, and supporters who earn her favor gain the ability to master any task, no matter how daunting

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to all skill checks.
Level 13 or 18+2 item bonus.
Level 23 or 28+3 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 10 (you and each ally in the burst); Choose one skill.
Each target gains a +1 power bonus to skill checks with the chosen skill until the end of the encounter.
Level 8+2 power bonus.
Level 13+3 power bonus.
Level 18+4 power bonus.
Level 23+5 power bonus.
Level 28+6 power bonus.

item.title: Kord's Mighty Strength
item.fluff: Kord lends his strength to followers who prove their mettle in battle against his enemies

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +5 item bonus to Strength checks to break objects.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a item bonus to melee damage rolls until the end of the encounter. The bonus equals the bonus you gain to Athletics checks from this boon.

item.title: Kord's Relentlessness
item.fluff: Kord marks you, who have have survived deadly combat through strength and fortitude alone, rendering you even more indomitable in battle
item.headline: Item BonusEndurance checks

block.name: Properties
block.line: This divine boon has the following properties:
You gain a +2 item bonus to death saving throws.
When you use your second wind, you gain an item bonus to the first melee damage roll you make before the end of your next turn. The item bonus equals this boon's bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou spend a healing surge while you are prone
EffectYou stand from prone without spending an action.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou succeed on a saving throw
EffectYou regain a number of hit points equal to this boon's level.

item.title: Lalali-Puy's Blessing
item.fluff: Those who please the Oba find that her blessing affords them protection from enemies

block.name: Property
block.line: When you start your turn with concealment because of obscured squares, you retain that concealment until the end of your next turn even if you leave the square that granted you concealment.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Weapon attack
EffectThe triggering enemy takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends) from the triggering attack.
Level 17Ongoing 10 poison damage.
Level 27Ongoing 15 poison damage.

item.title: Link to the Pillars
item.fluff: You have a divine connection to the Pillars of Ioun, and can leverage their might
item.headline: Skill checks made as part of a ritual

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou take damage of a specific type
EffectYou gain resist 5 against the triggering damage type until the end of the encounter. If the triggering damage has more than one type, choose one of those types.
Level 12 or 17Resist 10.
Level 22 or 27Resist 15.

item.title: Lolth's Fickle Favor
item.fluff: The Demon Queen of Spiders is a fickle goddess, as likely to offer a gift as she is to bestow a curse

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 poison.
Level 13 or 18Resist 10.
Level 23 or 28Resist 15.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy bloodies you with an attack
EffectRoll a d8.
On an odd number, you are dazed until the end of your next turn.
On an even number, you become invisible until the end of your next turn and you must teleport. You can teleport up to a number of squares equal to the die roll.

item.title: Mark of the Tembo
item.fluff: A tembo has had you in its dreadful fangs, and you yet live

block.name: Properties
block.line: This scar has the following properties:
You gain resist 5 necrotic.
Level 17Resist 10 necrotic.
Level 27Resist 15 necrotic.
If an enemy causes you to lose a healing surge or reduces the amount of hit points you regain, you gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your highest ability modifier.
Level 17Equal to 7 + your highest ability modifier.
Level 27Equal to 10 + your highest ability modifier.

item.title: Melora's Storm Blessing
item.fluff: Individuals who please Melora gain the ability to walk upon the air, soaring over their enemies and obstacles paced before them with ease

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are pushed, pulled, or slid
EffectYou can shift 1 square.
Level 23 or 28Shift 2 squares.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou fly 5 squares.
Level 86 squares.
Level 137 squares.
Level 188 squares.
Level 239 squares.
Level 2810 squares.

item.title: Moradin's Blessing of Iron
item.fluff: Moradin grants teh strength of the mountain and the toughness of iron to followers who win his favor, augmenting both body and mind, instilling bravery and toughness in his chosen

block.name: Property
block.line: If an enemy pushes you, you can reduce the maximum distance you are pushed by 2.
If an enemy pulls you and that pull leaves you adjacent to that enemy, you can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as an opportunity reaction.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou take damage
EffectYou reduce the damage you take by 5.
Level 8By 10.
Level 13By 15.
Level 18By 20.
Level 23By 25.
Level 28By 30.

item.title: Nature's Fervor
item.fluff: Defeating monsterss that corrupt the natural world fills you with zeal, enabling you to carry on the righteous battle

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your second wind, you can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. You gain an item bonus to this saving throw equal to this boon's bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou drop a non-minion enemy to 0 hit points
EffectYou gain your choice of either of the following two effects:
You spend a healing to surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value + twice this boon's bonus.
You regain an expended encounter attack power of this boon's level or lower.
If the triggering enemy was aberrant or undead, you can gain both effects.

item.title: Pelor's Sun Blessing
item.fluff: The undimmed light of Pelor shines from individuals who champion his cause, driving evil before them and bringing solace to companions fighting alongside them

block.name: Property
block.line: If you deal non-radiant damage to a target that has a vulnerability or other weakness to radiant damage, you deal additional damage equal to your [Constitution or Wisdom] modifier.
Level 13 or 18Equal to 2 + your [Constitution or Wisdom] modifier.
Level 23 or 28Equal to 4 + your [Constitution or Wisdom] modifier.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou emit bright light in a 5-square radius, and dim light for a further 5 squares.
You can use this power again to stop emitting light.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 5 (one ally in the burst); The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
Level 8The target also gains a +1 item bonus to saving throws until the end of the encounter.
Level 13Equal to his or her healing surge value + 1d6 additional hit points, and the target also gains a +1 item bonus to saving throws until the end of the encounter.
Level 18Equal to his or her healing surge value + 1d6 additional hit points, and the target also gains a +2 item bonus to saving throws until the end of the encounter.
Level 23Equal to his or her healing surge value + 2d6 additional hit points, and the target also gains a +2 item bonus to saving throws until the end of the encounter.
Level 28Equal to his or her healing surge value + 2d6 additional hit points, the and target also gains a +3 item bonus to saving throws until the end of the encounter.

item.title: Primeval Vigor
item.fluff: The vitality of the creatures massacred during the Cleansing Wars flows through you as you draw on primal energy to transform your body

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use a primal power with the Polymorph keyword
EffectYou gain temporary hit points equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier.
Level 17Equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.
Level 27Equal to 8 + your Constitution modifier.

item.title: Reflexive Psychic Shroud
item.fluff: Through your run-ins with horros cilopses and dagorrans, you have developed an innate psychic shield that masks your presence
item.headline: Stealth checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou roll initiative

EffectUntil the end of your first turn, you are hidden and cannot be seen by blindsight or tremorsense. If you can act during the surprise round, you gain this effect until the end of your turn on the first full round.

item.title: Sehanine's Mark of the Dark Moon
item.fluff: The priests of Sehanine speak of the dark moon, an invisible celestial object that casts protective shadows upon Sehanine's followers

block.name: Property
block.line: If a creature cannot see you, you take half damage from its attacks that hit you and no damage from its attacks that deal damage on a miss.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou take damage
EffectYou teleport 2 squares.
Level 8You teleport 3 squares. If you have cover or concealment at the destination, you can make a Stealth check to hide as part of the teleportation.
Level 13You teleport 4 squares, become invisible until the end of your next turn, and can make a Stealth check to hide as part of the teleportation.
Level 18You teleport 6 squares, otherwise as level 13.
Level 23You teleport 8 squares, otherwise as level 13.
Level 28As level 23, but you can use this power as an immediate interrupt instead.

item.title: The Raven Queen's Shroud
item.fluff: The Reven Queen cloaks her champions in a shroud of darkness, a halo of divine magic that aids them in enforcing the dictates of fate

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectRanged 10 (one creature); The target gains the mark of the Raven Queen until the end of the encounter.
On your turn, you can reroll one the result of one damage die against the target. This reroll does not alter the damge for other targets if your attack targeted creatures other than the target.
Level 13 or 18The result of two damage dice.
Level 23 or 28The result of three damage dice.

If the target is undead and the rerolled result is 1 on a d4 or d6, or a 1 or 2 on another die, you can keep rerolling until the result of that die is higher than that. Your DM might allow you to apply this effect to other enemies of the Raven Queen.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou teleport to a space adjacent to the target bears the mark of the Raven Queen. You must have a general idea where the bearer of the mark is, but do not need line of sight or line of effect.
Level 8You gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls against the bearer of the mark until the end of your next turn.
Level 13You gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls against the bearer of the mark until the end of your next turn.
Level 18You gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against the bearer of the mark until the end of your next turn.
Level 23You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against the bearer of the mark until the end of your next turn.
Level 13You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +6 power bonus to damage rolls against the bearer of the mark until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Tiamat's Insatiable Greed
item.fluff: Tiamat commands her followers to let no slight go unpunished and to take what they want
item.headline: Damage rolls against any creature that has damaged you since the end of your previous turn

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectChoose one ally you can see.

The chosen ally must choose one unexpended daily magic item power. That power is expended with no effect, and you regain the use of an expended daily magic item power for a magic item of the same level or lower.

item.title: Torog's Inescapable Suffering
item.fluff: Torog instructs his servants to embrace their agony, for only through pain can one unite the mortal and the divine

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are bloodied, you gain a +1 item bonus to all attack rolls.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a melee attack
EffectThe target becomes tightly bound by spectral chains (save ends).
While bound, the target is immobilized and takes ongoing 5 damage.
Level 14Ongoing 10 damage.
Level 24Ongoing 15 damage.

item.title: Torog's Lamentation of the Shackled
item.fluff: Torog grants his boon to ardent disciples who embrace pain and bondage, and who hope to be released from their earthly restraints by pledging themselves body and soul to the King That Crawls

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Saving throws against effects that make you slowed, immobilized, or restrained

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou become slowed, immobilized or restrained
EffectYou teleport a number of squares equal to 1 + this boon's bonus, and are no longer slowed, immobilized or restrained.

item.title: Verdant Presence
item.fluff: The power of the Forest Father flows through you, causing the land to flourish in your presence and with his blessing, you can bind your enemies with his abundant growth

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 1; The burst creates a zone of primal growth until the end of the encounter.
Level 15Close burst 2.
Level 25Close burst 3.
The zone is difficult terrain to creatures other than you. Once on each of your turns while the zone persists, you can make the following attack as a minor action:
AttackClose burst special (one creature in the zone); blessing's level +5 vs. Reflex
HitThe target is immobilized until the start of your next turn.
Miss (Level 25)The target is slowed until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Wrathful Spirit
item.fluff: The spirits residing in you cannot be fully contained, and their fury manifests in your ferocious attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 item bonus to damage rolls.
Level 16+4 item bonus.
Level 26+6 item bonus.
This bonus is halved for multiattacks.
